title: HBS Parser - Advanced Template Engine
description: A powerful and developer-friendly tool for creating, editing, and previewing Handlebars templates in real-time

features.name: Real-time Preview
features.description: See your templates rendered instantly as you type

features.name: VSCode-like Editor
features.description: Professional code editing experience with syntax highlighting

features.name: Auto-compilation
features.description: Automatic template compilation with error handling

features.name: File Import/Export
features.description: Import templates and data, export compiled HTML

customStyles: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); color: white; padding: 20px; border-radius: 10px; margin: 20px 0;
